texts.IoTHub:ProductKeyInvalid: Product key must be no longer than {MaxLength} characters and only allow combinations of letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-).
texts.IoTHub:ProductNameInvalid: The length of the product name shall be {MinLength}~{MaxLength} characters, which can include Chinese characters, English letters, numbers and underscores (_). One Chinese character counts as 2 characters.
texts.IoTHub:ProducCategoryNameInvalid: Product category name  must be no longer than {MaxCategoryNameLength} characters and only allow combinations of Chinese characters, letters, numbers, and symbols such as _, ?, ', #, (, ), ., ,, &, %, @, !, , and -.
texts.IoTHub:DescriptionInvalid: Description length must not exceed {MaxDescriptionLength} characters.
texts.IoTHub:CannotUpdatePulishedProduct: Product '{ProductName}' is pulished and cannot be updated.
texts.IoTHub:ProductModuleNameInvalid: Product key must be no longer than {MaxLength} characters and only allow combinations of letters, numbers and underscores (_).
texts.IoTHub:ProductModuleIdentifierInvalid: Product key must be no longer than {MaxLength} characters and only allow combinations of letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-)ã€‚Must not use the following system reserved parameters as identifiers: set, get, post, property, event, time, value.
texts.IoTHub:DuplicateProductModuleIdentifier: Product module identifier '{Identifier}' is already taken.
texts.IoTHub:DuplicateProductModuleName: Product module name '{Name}' is already taken.
texts.IoTHub:DeviceNameInvalid: The device name must be {MinLength} to {MaxLength} characters long and can contain English letters, numbers, and special characters: hyphen (-), underscore (_), at sign (@), half-width period (.), and half-width colon (:).
texts.IoTHub:DeviceRemarkNameInvalid: The remark name shall {MinLength} to {MaxLength} characters long and may contain Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, and underscores (_). One Chinese character counts as 2 characters.
